div.div:
Officially Licensed
Made By Nike
Support your favorite team and player anytime in the NFL® Limited jersey from Nike®. Inspired by what he's wearing on the field, Buy your favorite player jersey from the official shop of the NFL®. Features: 1. 100% recycled polyester 2. NFL® Nike brand jersey 3. Limited jersey with stitched tackle twill name and numbers 4. Tailored fit designed for movement 5. No-tag neck label offers clean comfort 6. Strategic ventilation for breathability 7. Woven jock tag at front lower left 8. NFL Shield at center front of neckline 9. Machine wash cold 10. Solid-body construction with opaque mesh side panels 11. Embroidered Nike logos on sleeves 12. Screen printed sleeve stripes 13. Heat transfer applique jock tag with alpha sizing at lower left hem 14. Officially licensed NFL product 15. Made in El Salvador!
